textAttribute.name: overview
textAttribute.text: This is the CDS $$primaryKey$$. It has $$number_of_exons$$ exon(s).

sqlQuery.name: ExternalLinks
sqlQuery.sql: select ed.name, dbr.primary_identifier, dbr.secondary_identifier, dbr.chromosome, dbr.centimorgans,dbr.external_database_release_id from dots.DBRefNASequence dbrn, sres.DBRef dbr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr where dbrn.na_sequence_id = $$primaryKey$$ and dbrn.db_ref_id = dbr.db_ref_id and dbr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id and edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id

sqlQuery.name: PSUCDSFields
sqlQuery.sql: select gf.name, gf.gene_type, gf.number_of_exons, gf.is_pseudo, gf.is_partial, gf.product, TO_CHAR(gf.modification_date, 'Mon DD, YYYY HH:MI:SSAM') as modification_date from dots.GeneFeature gf where gf.na_feature_id = $$primaryKey$$

sqlQuery.name: CDSNumExons
sqlQuery.sql: select gf.na_feature_id from dots.GeneFeature gf where gf.number_of_exons >= '$$Min$$' and gf.number_of_exons <= '$$Max$$'

sqlQuery.name: CDSByName
sqlQuery.sql: select gf.na_feature_id from dots.GeneFeature gf where gf.name like '$$Name$$'

sqlQuery.name: CDSByChromosome
sqlQuery.sql: select gf.na_feature_id from dots.ExternalNASequence ena, dots.GeneFeature gf where ena.taxon_id = '130246' and ena.chromosome = '$$Chromosome$$' and gf.na_sequence_id = ena.na_sequence_id

sqlQuery.name: Chromosome
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct ena.chromosome as term, ena.chromosome as internal from dots.ExternalNASequence ena where ena.taxon_id = '130246'
